# id: LogAdapter -> public static Log createLog(String name)
commentText: Create an actual {@link Log} instance for the selected API._@param name the logger name
codeText: public static Log createLog(String name) {_		switch (logApi) {_			case LOG4J:_				return Log4jAdapter.createLog(name)__			case SLF4J_LAL:_				return Slf4jAdapter.createLocationAwareLog(name)__			case SLF4J:_				return Slf4jAdapter.createLog(name)__			default:_				_				_				_				_				_				_				return JavaUtilAdapter.createLog(name)__		}_	}
